data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3499237,"name":"","username":"BobKan396","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/b/df705f/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-02-01T20:25:03.150Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eWe’ve been assembling our swerve drivetrain, and are running into some issues. So far, we get blinking red lights from the lights above the 40A fuses on our \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003ePDH\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"REV's Power Distribution Hub\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e. They seem to come on at random sometimes. After we clear sticky faults, they go away, and we haven’t noticed any major issues when they are flashing. We’ve tried going wire by wire, or fuse by fuse, and when we think we’ve got it diagnosed, it just randomly starts flashing again. Sometimes we power cycle the robot, and there’s no flashing. Then we immediately power cycle again, and there’s flashing. All ports with fuses will flash simultaneously, not just a few, but sometimes we’ll get a few stragglers that are solid red or flashing when the others aren’t. Any idea why this is happening?\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":1,"updated_at":"2025-02-01T20:25:03.150Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":17,"reads":144,"readers_count":143,"score":113.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":484694,"topic_slug":"pdh-lights-keep-flashing","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":64018,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/pdh-lights-keep-flashing/484694/1","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null}],"stream":[3499237]},"timeline_lookup":[[1,183]],"suggested_topics":[{"id":500281,"title":"R707 RFID Update - Did anyone use it?","fancy_title":"R707 RFID Update - Did anyone use it?","slug":"r707-rfid-update-did-anyone-use-it","posts_count":10,"reply_count":3,"highest_post_number":10,"image_url":null,"created_at":"2025-04-23T16:40:52.018Z","last_posted_at":"2025-06-03T04:23:16.231Z","bumped":true,"bumped_at":"2025-06-03T04:23:16.231Z","archetype":"regular","unseen":false,"pinned":false,"unpinned":null,"excerpt":"R707 was updated this season to allow RFID or NFC systems used exclusively within the robot.
